verses.name: Jeremiah 50:39
verses.text: Therefore the wild beasts of the desert with the wild beasts of the islands shall dwell there, and the owls shall dwell therein: and it shall be no more inhabited for ever; neither shall it be dwelt in from generation to generation.

verses.name: Jeremiah 50:40
verses.text: As God overthrew Sodom and Gomorrah and the neighbour cities thereof, saith the Lord; so shall no man abide there, neither shall any son of man dwell therein.

verses.name: Jeremiah 50:41
verses.text: Behold, a people shall come from the north, and a great nation, and many kings shall be raised up from the coasts of the earth.
